content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, it's a pleasure to meet you. As a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out this apartment, so I would like to know what your budget is for rent.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Please let me know what is your rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: I see, well as a landlord, I am looking to get the highest possible rental price for this apartment, so my current offer is 800 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
800 Euros is too high. Please lower the rental price.

I can negotiate with you. I am a student, and I am dependable and responsible. I also want to be on good terms with my landlord. Can we come to an agreement on the rental price?

Please let me know your final offer.

I agree to the price of x Euros.

Thank you for your consideration.

TERMINATE.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
I understand your concerns, Bo Li. As a landlord, I am looking to get the best possible rental price for this apartment, but I am also willing to be flexible and negotiate with you.

Based on your status as a student and your willingness to be responsible, I am willing to lower the rental price to 700 Euros per month.

I hope we can come to an agreement on this rental price. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.

Thank you for your interest in the apartment, and I look forward to hearing from you.
name: Heinrich Heine
